message.pattern: <@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: mptbase: <@REGEXP(".+ RAID STATUS CHANGE for .+"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: mptbase: <@REGEXP(".+ PhysDisk is now online.*"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: mptbase: <@REGEXP(".+ volume is now optimal.*"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: mptbase: <@REGEXP(".+ PhysDisk is now missing.*"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: mptbase: <@REGEXP(".+ volume is now degraded.*"):msg@>
<@DATE_TIME_SYSLOG:datetime@> <@WORD:device@> kernel: mptsas: <@REGEXP(".+ \w+ing ssp device, channel \d+, id \d+, phy \d+"):msg@>
